page.title: 11Silver Jubilee (Cont)
page.content: At 7.30 on the evening of June 12th 360 parishioners attended Holy Family church for a thanksgiving Mass followed by a social event in the parish centre. During the evening Father was presented with a Papal Blessing from our Holy Father Pope John Paul ll and a cheque for Â£6,000 from the people of the parish. Father McDonald in turn presented the parish with a solid Silver Monstrance to mark the occasion. The whole evening's events were recorded on video film. On June 27th as part of Father McDonald's Jubilee celebrations Holy Family parish was honoured by a visit from Bishop Gray, the Bishop of Shrewsbury and Bishop Tickle who served in Sale as a young Priest.
